name: Terrarium Environment
description:
Terrarium Environment is a small environment that is set within a vegetation terrarium that someone could create within their home. The environment itself is contained within a simple room reminiscing that of a simple living room using basic assets from the stater content found in Unreal Engine 5. 

Available for Windows and MacOS

System Requirements

Windows

  • 6 Core CPU or better
  • 16GB RAM
  • RTX 2070ti / AMD equivalent or better*

MacOS

  • M1 Pro Equipped System or better**

*Performance may alter depending on view point of scene. Expect further optimisations to performance in the future

**May also run on Intel Macs however with reduced performance
